papertrail

  • deliverable: style tiles & mock ups
  • role: visual design
  • problem: writing is hard. let us help.
  • methods: style tiles, mood boards,
  • artifacts: n/a

Solution:

PaperTrail was a digital humanities project, where a partner and I took charge of the visual site design. We developed a mood board in Pinterest, which led us to creating a few rudimentary color palettes. We then created a few style tiles, while also working on some general wireframes for the team. The project evolved more than I expected, and that was the big takeaway for me: a design will seldom be clear initially, and will almost never be static.

© . ricky holtz.
